archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1047
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want any online tool that provides the ability to interact with Vodafone or where an agent or customer makes an enquiry regarding payments, there is an audit trail captured of the interaction reflected back against that customer account

properties.value: Is it related to the payments history or logs from opening payments history? Info what happend to payment and for what reason. A comment to each financial operation should fulfill this requirement.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
